text: The Wind and the Lion is a 1975 American war adventure drama movie directed by John Milius and starring Sean Connery, Candice Bergen, Brian Keith, John Huston, Roy Jenson, Nadim Sawalha, Marc Zuber, Antoine Saint-John and Darrell Fetty. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1976. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 war movies Category:1975 adventure movies Category:American war movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Milius Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in Morocco Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1975 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American epic movies Category:1970s epic movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about politicians Category:Swashbuckler movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:1975 action movies Category:Movies about the United States Marine Corps
title: The Wind and the Lion
